title.narrative: IMPLEMENT PARTICIPATORY STRATEGIES

description.narrative: By 2016, local governments and communities have increased capacities to implement participatory strategies to improve pregnant women' s and children under 3 years access to pertinent health care and nutrition services, which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: As of 2016, at least 30% of children under three years of age have access to comprehensive care and protection which promote early child development, in prioritized Amazonian and Andean areas well as in excluded urban areas
